name: Shajman Faiz
position: Full Stack Web Developer | Mechanical Engineer
projectsSubtitle: Here are a few projects I've worked on recently...
summary: Full Stack Web Developer experienced in React, Next.js, Python, and FastAPI. I enjoy building clean, reliable web applications and automating workflows using Python. My background in Mechanical Engineering and coating inspection helps me approach problems with structured thinking. Currently improving my backend skills and exploring automation and AI-based development.

workExperience.description: A software solutions provider delivering modern web and mobile applications across the GCC.
workExperience.keyAchievements: Migrated legacy websites to React/Next.js improving performance by 40%. Built responsive and accessible UIs with clean component architecture. Integrated APIs, handled deployment pipelines, and automated workflows using GitHub Actions. Followed Agile processes including sprints and code reviews.

workExperience.description: Supported surface preparation and coating workflows, ensuring compliance with industrial standards.
workExperience.keyAchievements: Helped streamline daily activities and supported quality checks during coating operations.
